name: Festival Simulator 2020
description:
Music Festival Simulator 2020 is a virtual concert experience!

Controls:  W,A,S,D to move, use the mouse to look around!

Works best in Google Chrome

Mac and Windows executable files also available if you can't run it in your browser!

  • Listen to the music! (all created by me)
  • Walk through the crowd!
  • See the lights and visuals!
  • Talk to some fellow festival-goers!
